summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: If you can have Spurs's number nine for seven and a half million, by the way, we're talking about Dominick Solanke.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: Before it was officially announced he was in my team... the perfect third forward.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: We saw, I think again, a very good Oscar Bob, which we've mentioned already in our first three shows.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: Oscar Bob did continue to impress again... he's got two goals and three assists in that time.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: I still think he will start game week one.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: Haaland didn't score again, but he never really scores in Community Shield and yet always starts the season well.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: Just because he didn't do a lot in this one doesn't worry me too much.

summary.speaker: Kelly Somers
summary.text: I'm leaning towards Diogo Jota.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: Jota feels like a really nice alternative and has been playing in that forward role.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: If you can't make Salah, Jota for me is the obvious kind of replacement.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: Rashford... missed some chances... I was quite disappointed with him.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: Rashford was getting in the right places, doing the right things, and then just not finishing any of them.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: Garnacho is the one value in that team that I think he's going to deliver.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: I was convinced by Garnacho enough to bring him back into the squad.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: I think if you decide no Salah, you can try like Sam and try to make it work.

summary.speaker: Kelly Somers
summary.text: Him being fit at the start of the season suggests he's a valuable pick.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: I think Jota will be a good option.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: I think you need a Liverpool player, whatever that is.

summary.speaker: Kelly Somers
summary.text: I'm struggling to get my Salah in.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: Bowen went a little bit under the radar last season.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: Eze is still really good value.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: I think there's good value there.
